attributes.action: Access money in private pensions to help with financial difficulties.
attributes.additional_details: To ease financial problems during the Coronavirus (Covid-19) outbreak.
attributes.background:
Those people in their 20s, 30s, 40s will have money locked in private pension schemes.

Change the law to allow them emergency access to this money. This will greatly assist with financial burdens during this unprecedented time and still allow time to rebuild these pension pots for retirement.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305886

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
